name: Mysterious companion-cube
description:
Hi, I'm glad to introduce to you the mysterious companion-cube game prototype.

This game is a little adventure with puzzles for you and your friend - cube, in a strange, always changing place. You are ti find were are you, why are you here and why you need help of a cube and cube needs your.

This is my first solo made game prototype, i hope you'll enjoy it and give a feedback, so i can continue work on it, and epesent to you a great game expirience inspired by portal.

Support:

Keyboard&mouse
